message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $12,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your position, however,  $18,000 is closer to the true value of this product.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $15,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000. This is my final offer, as I'm comfortable buying from John at $10,000 if we can't reach an agreement.
